title: Dijon roast rack of lamb
ingredients: ['25g (1 oz) fresh breadcrumbs', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black black pepper', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (7 bone) rack of lamb, trimmed and frenched', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard']
